name: Mission Codename Groceries
description:
An experiment with the basic rules of level design

Single player runner game encompassing mini-games and visual novel elements, with a mix of 2D and 3D elements, where the player needs to complete them with succession to win at the game.

We play as a kid who needs to do some grocery shopping at the request of his mother on a list, but filled with pride, the kid decides to not take the list, as they feel certain they’ll remember everything. During the journey from home to the convenient store, the kid faces many distractions and once reaching the store, it’s up to the player to remember the items the mother requested.

Note: This was developed as a university project, and it's currently in its beta form. Subsequent updates will be made to this game until the final 1.0 version

Features:

  • Runner
  • Visual Novel
  • Mini-Games

Team credits:

Octávio Silva (Game Developer)
